column1: 1. Can you tell me about a time when you saw a pattern in external events?&
2. Describe a project you've worked on and how you organized it from start to finish.&
3. Can you give an example of a situation where you had high standards for yourself or others and why they were important to you?&
4. How do you typically approach decision making in challenging situations?&
5. Tell me about a time when you took initiative to implement a new idea. How did it turn out?&
